title: Euro Travel Rock

title: Work Day Scheduler
bio: An application that allows you to schedule hour to hour how your work day will look like.

title: Password Generator
bio: An application that will allow the user to create a randomly generated password from different questions that are asked.

title: Instagram Portfolio
bio: A side project I started to mix my two favorite things, coding and sneaker photography. I wanted to see how it would develop over time.

title: See Something Say Something
bio: An application that allows you to report and view crime in your local area.

title: Note Taker
bio: An application that allows you to create and delete notes.
